name: Clockwise Neck Circles
how_to_perform:
1. Slowly turn your head to the right, keeping your eyes looking down towards the ground and your shoulders relaxed.

2. Keeping your head in this position, slowly turn it back to the center until your ears are above your shoulders.

3. Then, again very slowly, continue turning your head all the way around to the left until you're facing to the side with your eyes still looking down.

4. Hold for a brief moment to feel the stretch and then slowly return your head to its original position at rest.

5. Repeat on the opposite side by rotating your head in a clockwise direction, from right to center to left.
short_summary: Clockwise neck circles are an exercise that stretches and loosens the muscles of the neck, helping to improve flexibility and range of motion.
